Herr Eckhardt,

I find Fred a difficult negotiator, but you may have better=
 luck with him.

=A0=A0 The problem with unbound used copies of these books=
 is that the original ones from Christies had weak glue in the binders. Of =
many sets, the pages fall out all over the place. If you can find a bound s=
et, it is better.


Curran
